Posts.Content: Oct 1, 2009 11:59AM daughterofpotter wrote: (I'm a caregiver) My mom was 42 when originally diagnosed stage I...57 for bone mets.  I am 28 and the radiologist "strongly advised" me not to undergo a mammogram (and subsequently talked me out of it) until I was at least 35.  I noticed reading these posts that that age is sometimes too late.  Can anyone offer advice regarding a mammogram at my age?  Should I be pushing for an MRI instead?  Since my mom was premenapausal, it seems that my sister and I should not wait until we're 40 (when our insurance companies will pay for it!).
Posts.Title: Poll - How old were you when dx with BC Times3 Minetta57
